rooms.name: room1
rooms.desc: You are in a plain void. You can't comprehend what the world is like.

rooms.name: room2
rooms.desc: You're in another room. This one is just as incomprehensible, but calming.

npc.name: man1
npc.label: a man
npc.desc: It's hard to tell if they're really a man, or something else. Perhaps they don't exist at all.

npc.name: void
npc.label: the void
npc.desc: The void looks back at you, confused.

dialogue.name: void-man1
dialogue.text: You use the void on the man, and the void and the man are one! You pocket the void, slightly confused. The void is even moreso.
